channel.title: Comments on: ImageMagick convert – PDF to JPG, Partial Image Size Problem

item.title: By: Thiri
item.dc:creator: Thiri
item.description: Thank you so much Joseph. You saved my life.
item.content:encoded: Thank you so much Joseph. You saved my life.

item.title: By: Gary
item.dc:creator: Gary
item.description: Just wanna let you know that 8 years later, your blog post just saved our lives ! Thanks !
item.content:encoded: Just wanna let you know that 8 years later, your blog post just saved our lives ! Thanks !

item.title: By: Joseph Scott

item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2009/11/16/imagemagick-convert-pdf-to-jpg-partial-image-size-problem/#comment-3128">Mark</a>.

item.content:encoded:
In reply to Mark.

Glad to hear it helped.

item.title: By: Mark
item.dc:creator: Mark
item.description: The same issue is found in graphicsmagick (i.e.: "gm convert..."), and your solution applies there too. Thanks for saving me a lot of hair tearing.
item.content:encoded: The same issue is found in graphicsmagick (i.e.: “gm convert…”), and your solution applies there too. Thanks for saving me a lot of hair tearing.

item.title: By: Rathod
item.dc:creator: Rathod
item.description: Please help me if you have solustion. I have pdf but without bleed and trimbox so I want to add Trimbox using PHP. How to add dynamically Trimbox in pdf.
item.content:encoded:
Please help me if you have solustion.
I have pdf but without bleed and trimbox so I want to add Trimbox using PHP.
How to add dynamically Trimbox in pdf.

item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2009/11/16/imagemagick-convert-pdf-to-jpg-partial-image-size-problem/#comment-3125">Ron Michalowski</a>.
You are welcome. I figured if it is frustrating to me then someone else may have problems with it too.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Ron Michalowski.

You are welcome. I figured if it is frustrating to me then someone else may have problems with it too.

item.title: By: Ron Michalowski
item.dc:creator: Ron Michalowski
item.description: Thank you, I have spent hours trying to solve this problem. I can't believe that this is not noted in the documentation under cropping.
item.content:encoded: Thank you, I have spent hours trying to solve this problem. I can’t believe that this is not noted in the documentation under cropping.

item.title: By: David
item.dc:creator: David
item.description:
Hi! You make my day!
My problem was that with some pages the conversion doubles its size, so when the average image size was 1024px, on some pages it creates 2048px width with a blank padding on its left.
This define works very good.
item.content:encoded:
Hi! You make my day!

My problem was that with some pages the conversion doubles its size, so when the average image size was 1024px, on some pages it creates 2048px width with a blank padding on its left.

This define works very good.
